snippet: The Oglala Sioux Tribe is suing large brewers and stores in neighboring Whiteclay, Neb., that the tribe says encourage illegal alcohol consumption.
abstract: Oglala Sioux Tribe is suing large brewers and stores in neighboring Whiteclay, Neb, that it says encourage illegal alcohol consumption; suit seeks $500 million for costs incurred by the tribe for health care and other issues related to chronic drinking; it argues that brewers and stores know that they are selling alcohol to people who have no permissible place to consume it.
lead_paragraph: The Oglala Sioux Tribe is suing large brewers and stores in neighboring Whiteclay, Neb., that the tribe says encourage illegal alcohol consumption.

headline.seo: Next to Tribe With Alcohol Ban, a Hub of Beer
headline.main: At Tribe’s Door, a Hub of Beer and Heartache
headline.print_headline: At Tribe’s Door, A Hub of Beer And Heartache
